name: Diceworld: Immortal
description:
Hi, I'm the artist of this project. This game is sadly kind of scuffed since the build that my programmer uploaded wasn't working and he wasn't available to fix it. So I had to remake the entire game within just 5 hours. Sorry for the quality, it's the best I managed to do in the time I had. Diceworld: Immortal is the hot new action adventure, metroidvania, platformer by the creator who brought you smash hits like: Icon.png, apex (not legends), and the one in which you play a clump of flesh.

The concept is simple: 

1. get coins by hitting your head on floating, golden dice.

1,5. (optional) Use the in game shop to buy more coins to get to the rewards quicker and save time.

2. open lootbo... I mean *surprise mechanics* to obtain random gifts.

3. explore the world to find the end goal and finish the game.

Controls:

A and D: Movement

Space: Jump

#stuff#: - lootbox drop chance is not actually random - the in game shop is needed to progress if you don't want to grind for hours - all our employees are underpaid and slept in the office for the last two months of development because the crunch was real - some of our employees breast milk was stolen, so they weren't able come to work and had to get laid off - this whole thing is not a joke or parody.. absolutely not -
